DGOutput.title: DGOutput
DGOutput.description:
These are all the product visited by the customer that the agent will use to provide contextualized answer.

If there are multiple productEngagements returned, pick the latest/ most recent record by checking this field ssot__EngagementDateTm__c

detailedDescription.title: detailedDescription
detailedDescription.description: The detailed description of the last product seen by the custom

outputReply.title: outputReply
outputReply.description: The answer to confirm the product name

productDescription.title: productDescription
productDescription.description: A general description of the last product seen by the customer.

productFamily.title: productFamily
productFamily.description: The family of the last product seen by the customer.

productID.title: productID
productID.description: The ID of the last product seen by the customer.

productName.title: productName
productName.description: The name of the last product seen by the customer.

productURL.title: productURL
productURL.description: The URL of the last product seen by the customer.

setMessage.title: setMessage
setMessage.description: Car Name That the Customer is Interested in
